name: ExtendedUnrar
author: thorli
requirements: This script requires Python 3.8.0+ to be installed on your system.
description: This script extracts nested rar archives from downloaded files.

options.name: UnrarPath
description: Full Path to Unrar executable (optional, default: unrar).

options.name: WaitTime
description: Time (in seconds) to pause start of script (default: 0).
(Gives NZBGet time to perform "UnpackCleanupDisk" action on slow systems).

options.name: DeleteLeftover
description: Delete leftover rar files after successful extract.
